slow_internet.solution: Try restarting your router and checking your connection settings.

app_crashing.symptom: The app keeps crashing on startup.
app_crashing.solution: Update the app to the latest version and restart your device.

login_issues.symptom: I can't log into my account.
login_issues.solution: Reset your password using the 'Forgot Password' link.

printer_not_working.solution: Check the printer's connection and ensure it has paper and ink.

blue_screen_error.symptom: My computer shows a blue screen error.
blue_screen_error.solution: Restart your computer and check for hardware issues or driver updates.
